works.description: Now, this is one real treat for the beer lovers. Billed as the world’s first personal brewery, the WilliamsWarn lets you have commercial quality beer in 7 days, just like a big brewery. Created by brewmaster Ian Williams and food technology engineer Anders Warn, the WilliamsWarn Personal Brewery has six main technical features, which combine to create the world’s first all-in-one brewing appliance. This combination allows the pros and novices alike to make the freshest beer with minimum effort.
